thread.section_title: musicMagpie Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.musicmagpie.co.uk
thread.title: Oliver A

author: Oliver A
title: Oliver A
text: I've used Music Magpie a few times in the last month or so now and have found the service to be brilliant. The app is easy to use for logging items and straightforward when going through the payment and delivery steps. On one occasion I needed an extra label as I had two boxes, the customer support (telephone) were very helpful and resolved the problem instantly. Would recommend to anyone. A hassle free way of decluttering.
